content: Check out this amazing GitHub repository: https://github.com/Wallesters-org/Wallestars - it has Claude AI integration!
TODO: Review PR #95 for delegation order. This is critical for the project workflow.

Meeting notes from standup:
- Completed Android control feature
- Working on MCP integration
- Need to fix screenshot timeout issue
Forwarded message from DevChannel: New Claude Sonnet 4.5 model is available! Upgrade recommended.

Useful resources:
- Anthropic API Docs: https://docs.anthropic.com/
- MCP Protocol: https://modelcontextprotocol.io/
- React Docs: https://react.dev/
Reminder: Deploy to production on Friday. Check all environment variables are set correctly.
Old note: Initial prototype used Python backend. Deprecated and replaced with Node.js + Express.
Bug report: Screenshot capture failing on Ubuntu 22.04. Issue #94 tracks this.
Feature request: Add Telegram message analysis capability. See issue #96

Wallestars v1.0 released! ðŸŽ‰
New features:
- Claude Sonnet 4.5
- Computer Use on Linux
- Android Control
- Prompt Generator
Security update: Ensure API keys are not committed to git. Use .env files.
Discussion: Should we add email analysis next? Thoughts?
